messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 1540
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 10/19/01 9:04:27 AM Mountain Daylight Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 10/19/01 9:04:27 AM Mountain Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< My daughter is making plans to fly to NYC for a week with her boyfriend
next month. He has some good friends at NYU they can stay with.

My husband has no fears about this at all, and encourages her to go and
experience. I'm trying to see it that way, but I'm not having much success at
the moment.

Sigh.

Susan
>>


I am w/ you Susan. I was to make a trip back to PA. this month. I said no
way,my mother thinks I am ridiculous. Maybe I am but I'm not comfortable
traveling w/ a 5 year old when so much is going on.

Sorry I didn't alay any concerns.

NICKI~
